issue.title: Robots not working with new docker images

content.raw:
Thanks Nate for taking a look at this. I see the free memory decreasing too. Those atop logs are part of the bridge container, is that right?

I’ll add atop logging to my solution containers to try to isolate which process is leaking the memory. Interestingly this wasn’t occurring before the 04/06 logging updates. I can repro this “locally” in AWS which should help with debugging it on my end.
content.html:
Thanks Nate for taking a look at this. I see the free memory decreasing too. Those atop logs are part of the bridge container, is that right?

I’ll add atop logging to my solution containers to try to isolate which process is leaking the memory. Interestingly this wasn’t occurring before the 04/06 logging updates. I can repro this “locally” in AWS which should help with debugging it on my end.
